title: LEARNER
copy: . I AM ALWAYS CURIOUS, RELYING ON MY EXPERIENCE AND ACTIVELY ENGAGING OTHERS IN ORDER TO PROCESS AND CONTEXTUALIZE IDEAS AND CONCEPTS.

title: PROBLEM SOLVER
copy: . I AM PRO-ACTIVE, SEEKING ELEGANT, LONG-TERM SOLUTIONS FOR UNIQUE PROBLEMS. I VALUE SIMPLICITY AND MAINTAIN FOCUS ON THE UNDERLYING REASONS FOR SOLVING THE PROBLEM.

title: LEADER
copy: . I BELIEVE THAT EVERYONE HAS SOMETHING VALUABLE TO CONTRIBUTE AND GREAT LEADERS COMBINE WISDOM WITH INTELLIGENT COMMUNICATION TO INFLUENCE INDIVIDUALS AND DRIVE CHANGE.
